comment.body:
Thanks for your useful activity on ZN.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1G2TYVkNJvVfmRqPtWGTLqHDUjJKMjMEBA/

I am a little bit late by this post but I have two points on this issue:
- best would be to be implemented the most easier version(which is 1 user 1 site) after my opinion
Why ? if they are 2 equally good solutions always the easiest is the good one
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Occam's_razor 
- but I trust the judgement of the developer who created ZN and if he want the other, more complicated version then let it be because not I am who will implement it
